summary.Title: Hotel Rooms Cleaning at Nobis Hotel 5* - Housekeeping
summary.JobHeadline: Hotel Rooms Cleaning at Nobis Hotel 5* - Housekeeping
summary.Presentation:
BEST HOTEL CLEANING JOB
Our Housekeeping Team at Nobis Hotel is growing and Keeperz are searching for a new Team Member with high energy & a "Yes we can - attitude" to join.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Hotel Rooms Cleaning at Nobis Hotel 5* - Housekeeping
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
BEST HOTEL CLEANING JOB

Our Housekeeping Team at Nobis Hotel is growing and Keeperz are searching for a new Team Member with high energy & a "Yes we can - attitude" to join.

Nobis Hotel is a luxury 5* with 75 rooms. The hotel is located just 5 min. from the Central Station in Copenhagen.

We have the following positions open:

# Hotel Rooms Cleaning

Contract 20 hours pr. week
Working hours 09.00 – 14.30/15.00
Incl. every 2. weekend.

To apply you must have:

  • A great eye for details
  • Be able to work fast and efficient
  • Have high evergy and a positive attitude
  • Be able to work every 2. weekend

WE PAY PER HOUR AND NOT PER ROOM
START: As soon as possible.

Please forward your CV and picture to info@keeperz.dk

I look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,

Kenneth Willemoes
Keeperz ApS
www.Keeperz.dk
